gameDetails.name: Broom Service: Christmastime
gameDetails.description:
Originally included in the Brettspiel Adventskalender 2016 for day 5 this expansion consists of 4 tiles themed around gift giving.  When a player uses one of the included tile, each other player gets a little gift from the supply.

Contents:
1 cloud tile
1 forest tile
1 mountain tile
1 hill tile
